block.extrabotany.sunbless.reference: May the light heal and enlighten you
block.extrabotany.moonbless.reference: May you find all you have lost
block.extrabotany.edelweiss.reference: Do you want to build a snowman?
block.extrabotany.geminiorchid.reference: Why is a raven like a writing desk?
block.extrabotany.bloodyenchantress.refe: A bargain forged in blood and shadow
extrabotany.armorset.shadowwarrior.desc0: 黑夜给了我黑色的眼睛，
extrabotany.armorset.goblinslayer.desc0: 我不拯救世界，只管杀哥布林。
extrabotany.armorset.goblinslayer.desc1: 想象力也是武器，没有想象力的人会先死。
extrabotany.armorset.shadowwarrior.name: Shadow Warrior
extrabotany.armorset.goblinslayer.name: Goblin Slayer
extrabotany.armorset.miku.name: Starry Idol
extrabotany.armorset.maid.name: 昴星团战斗女仆
extrabotany.foxmaskinfo0: 与君相别离，不知何日是归期，我如朝露转瞬晞
extrabotany.foxmaskinfo1: 如今面具和花散里分开了
extrabotany.foxmaskinfo2: 派蒙也不会叫她面具巫女小姐了
mri.ult0: 火火火火火火光光光光光光光
mri.ult1: 火红红红红红火火光光光光光
mri.ult2: 光火红红红红红红火光光光光
mri.ult3: 光光火红红红红红红火光光光
mri.ult4: 光光光火红红红红红红火光光
mri.ult5: 光光光光火红红红红红红火光
mri.ult6: 光光光光光火红红红红红红火
mri.ult7: 光光光光光光火火火火火火火
extrabotany.page.bloodyenchantress0: The Bloody Enchantress creates &4Mana&0 by consuming nearby creatures' life. Creatures sacrificed to the Bloody Enchantress will not produce any drops or experience.
extrabotany.page.bloodyenchantress1: Every bite will add a effect called Blood Temptation and overlay with higher amplifier one, the mana production will decrease according to the level of Blood Temptation, and the flower will stop working if the total level of Blood Temptation of all the creatures nearby is over a threshold.
extrabotany.page.sunbless0: Like the &1Dayblooms&0 the Sunshine Lily produces &4Mana&0 from sunlight, but it is slightly more efficient. Please note that it will still decay.
extrabotany.page.moonbless0: Like the &1Nightshade&0 the Moonlight Lily generates &4Mana&0 at night, but it is slightly more efficient. Please note that it will still decay.
extrabotany.page.omniviolet0: According to a saying, knowledge is power. The Omniviolet converts Books or Written Books into &4Mana&0. To increase the amount of mana generated, Bookshelves can be placed around the Omniviolet in a similar fashion to an Enchantment Table.
extrabotany.page.tinkle0: The Tinkle flower converts kinetic energy of nearby moving players into &4Mana&0. It will also increase players' energy consumption.
extrabotany.page.tinkle1: Ding dong, here I come to find you.
extrabotany.page.bellflower0: When placed in the open, the Bell Flower creates &4Mana&0 from wind. The higher it is, the more mana it produces. A Livingrock Pedestal nearby with a Nature Orb in it can increase its mana generation efficiency. Since it is a passive flower, it will decay.
extrabotany.page.bellflower1: Only the storms can knock down the trees.
extrabotany.page.reikarlily0: The Reikar Lily turns the tremendous energy of lightning into &4Mana&0. When a lightning bolt hits nearby, it will generate a great amount of &4Mana&0 immediately and continue to produce &4Mana&0 for a long time. Reikar Lily itself could attract thunder.
extrabotany.page.edelweiss0: Edelweiss will swallow the snow golem to produce mana. The mana production is done instantly, but there are still intervals.
extrabotany.page.edelweiss1: If you are reading this, you can read.
extrabotany.page.geminiorchid0: A &1Gemini Orchid&0 is like a thermoelectric generator. If you place a block of lava in one of eight blocks nearby, and then place a block of water in another position, it will begin to produce mana. The higher the gap between two blocks' temperatures, the quicker mana will be generated. Since it is a passive flower, it will decay.
extrabotany.page.manabuffer0: The Mana Buffer can store as much &4Mana&0 as 64 Mana Pools. It will drain &4Mana&0 from adjacent mana pools or mana buffer and supply it to a Mana Pool or Mana Buffer placed on top of it.
extrabotany.page.powerframe0: Place a mana item in the Power Frame, and the Power Frame will extract mana from the mana pool above and transfer to the mana item.
extrabotany.page.froststar0: The &1Frost Star&0 freezes large areas of water and lava. It also applies slowness creatures looked at by the wearer.
extrabotany.page.froststar1: I am the frozen heart of the Scourge!
extrabotany.page.deathring0: The &1Death Ring&0 applies the Wither and Unluck effect on creatures looked at by the wearer at the cost of some &4Mana&0.
extrabotany.page.deathring1: Do not fear power... fear those who wield it!
extrabotany.page.failnaught0: The Failnaught uses &4Mana&0 to shoot magic arrows which pierce through enemies and deal damage to the creatures in the area. The longer you draw the bow, the more damage it will deal.
extrabotany.page.failnaught1: A hundred shots, a hundred bullseyes.
extrabotany.page.camera0: Shameimaru's Camera strips nearby creatures of their abilities. Projectiles in sight will vanish. Creatures affected by this will return to normal after a period of time. The camera can affect boss for a very short period instead.
extrabotany.page.sagesmanaring0: The &4Sages Mana Ring&0 can store nearly a infinite amount of &4Mana&0.
extrabotany.page.buddhistrelics0: Origin Creation - The Omniscience relic can simulate some of the Relics by pressing ctrl to switch its form. Keeping other forms will cost &4Mana&0. With insufficient mana it will change to its original form.
extrabotany.page.coregod0: A upgrade to the Flügel tiara, the Core of Herrscher alows infinite flight at the cost of &4Mana&0. The Core of Herrscher also gives a slight strength boost and provides faster flight than the tiara
extrabotany.page.miku0: An improved version of Manasteel Armor,it gives the wearer a high mana discount.
extrabotany.page.shadowium0: With the magic of Gilded Mashed Potato, we can use Nightmare Fuel and a Elementium Ingot to make Shadowium. It's a very special kind of material and it performs better than Elementium.
extrabotany.page.shadowium3: With the power of Shadowium, Armour crafted with it will give wearer speed, strength, and night vision when the night comes. A sword made of it also seems to call upon Shadow pixies.
extrabotany.page.photonium0: 精神燃料与源质钢锭的完美结合。$(item)光子锭$(0)是一种优秀的材料，它是暗影锭的对立面。
extrabotany.page.photonium3: 它可以用于制作$(item)哥布林杀手套$(0)，这套装备可以在白天提供极强的再生和生命提升能力。
extrabotany.page.header0: Welcome to the World of the supreme principle of Mana! You are the one who has great potential and I believe you will have a shiny, bright future. I am sure you are hunger for more knowledge. Follow me, I will pass on my knowledge and experience to you.
extrabotany.page.header1: The more progress you have done, the more knowledge you will have. I could give you one hint, you could obtain Spirit Fuel by eating Nightmare Fuel.
extrabotany.page.excaliber0: Excaliber could shoot golden mana beam that will automatically trace enemies in a large area.
extrabotany.page.infinitewine0:
Infinite Wine, that you can drink almost infinitly, it only costs mana to refill. To make one, you just need to combine a Special-made Cocktail with heroes medal.You can change the effects by crafting with other varieties of Special-made Cocktail.
Be carefull though, if you drink it all before it can refill, you will lose your relic and get a empty mana glass back, and you can only Restore 3 uses per minecraft day.
extrabotany.page.peaceamulet0: Peace Amulet could guarantee that all weapons in ExtraBotany will no longer deal damage to other players and friendly mobs.
extrabotany.page.powerglove0: Power Glove allows you to auto leftclick at maximum attack speed if you keep pressing your mouse. It also slightly increase your attack speed.
